description: Try our easy to follow Charred Brussels Sprouts With Brown Butter Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Brussels sprout,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Charred Brussels Sprouts With Brown Butter Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large saucepan of water to the boil over high heat. Cook sprouts for 3-5 minutes or until tender. Drain.

Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook sprouts, tossing regularly, for 6-8 minutes or until charred. Season. Add butter, thyme and garlic and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until butter turns a nut-brown colour and garlic and thyme are fragrant. Serve.
